name: WP Clean Characters
author: Michael Pretty (prettyboymp)

sections.description: Copying and pasting content from the web or other documents can insert invalid characters into post content and create invalid RSS feeds. WP Clean Characters fixes this by converting those invalid characters into valid UTF-8 entities when saving a post. A feature is also included to go through your post archive and clean any invalid characters in those as well.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the wp-clean-chars folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What if I’m not using UTF-8 Encoding

This plugin won’t make any changes to your content if your site’s encoding is not set to UTF-8.

short_description: This plugin will convert the characters pasted from any character set to a valid UTF-8 entities.
